page.title: 07LIFE STYLES
page.content: I am a 12 year old girl. At 7.30a.m. I wake up,get dressed in my school uniformand go downstairs to have my breakfast of rice krispies & orange juice.Mum and Dad are at the table as well.Dad is a technical manager at an aluminium foil company & Mum is a dinner lady at a primary school. About 8.15 my friend comes to catch the bus with me as we live 4 miles from school(our buses are free). At school we do Geography,Games, Art, Maths, Science & English. At 12.10 it's dinner break & we can have a cafeteria lunch or sandwiches. We have a short break at 10.40 for a drink. In the afternoon the bus reaches home about 4.10p.m. If I have homework from school I do that; if not Iplay tennis, watch television or organise my stamp collection.
